body_html:
Thanks for the reply. I'm switching to your design. Just out of curiosity, can I pull the same thing off using a Saver? It seems what Saver essentially does is the same as what you described.

I'm using Version: 0.9.0rc0. Can update to a newer version if it is available.

body:
Thanks for the reply. I'm switching to your design. Just out of curiosity, can I pull the same thing off using a `Saver`? It seems what `Saver` essentially does is the same as what you described.

I'm using Version: 0.9.0rc0. Can update to a newer version if it is available.
